content.rendered:
Appointment Setter | Tulsa,  OK
  • Full time and part time positions available
  • Responsible to generate leads
  • High-volume outbound calls
Requirements:
  • Call center experience
  • Phone skills
  • Professional demeanor and communication
  • Retail sales is a plus
  • Sales experience is a plus
  • Military background is a plus
Compensation is $10/hr
